tgt_original: buddhānāṃ mukuṭo'kṣobhyaḥ śeṣāḥ svādhipasekinaḥ |  kāyeśākṣobhyavāgīśacitteśairdvāriṇo matāḥ ||91 ||
sarvaḥ(rva)dharmaiḥ stuyāccakraṃ saṃbuddhasvātmamūrtibhiḥ |  pañcajñānāni mudrābhiḥ śatapañcakulaṃ trikam ||94 ||
kāyādisphārasaṃhāraiḥ kuryājjāpaṃ yathākramam ||110 ||  uccāryaivaṃ viyad vyāpya kāyādyaistaiḥ svaraśmibhiḥ |
sarvadharmatayā śuddhaṃ tritattvairabhimantritam |  svādhidaivatasaccakraṃ prīṇayaṃstena pūjayet ||123 ||
tattatkāyādi yatkarma sarvabuddhāṃstu pūjayan |  anurūpaṃ jagatkāryaṃ kuryānnityaṃ samāhitaḥ ||126 ||
